cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16)
project(kivi)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 20)

include_directories(include)
include_directories(autogen)

add_compile_definitions(PARSING_VISUALIZATION_ENABLED)

add_executable(kivi
	main.cpp
	parser.cpp
	parsing_visualizer.cpp
	include/parser.hpp
	include/parsing_visualizer.hpp

	# Generated by `re2c`
	autogen/kivi_lexer.tab.cc

	# Generated by `bison`
	autogen/kivi_parser.tab.cc
	autogen/kivi_parser.tab.hh
	autogen/location.hh
	autogen/position.hh
	autogen/stack.hh
)
